disadvantages.title: Disadvantages of handling accounting yourself
disadvantages.first: Time loss – instead of growing your business, you have to deal with reports, taxes, and accounting details.
disadvantages.second: Risk of mistakes – even a minor inaccuracy in calculations or tax reporting can lead to fines.
disadvantages.third: Changes in legislation – accounting norms are constantly updated, and without professional support, it’s easy to miss important changes.
disadvantages.fourth: Lack of optimization – without deep financial knowledge, you may overpay taxes and miss out on available benefits.
disadvantages.fifth: Stress and responsibility – financial mistakes can cost your business reputation and money.
